name: Romantic Book-Demo
description:
This story is about a guy who loves literature. But will he continue to love only literature? It depends on you. 

The choices in the game affect the entire game, not just a specific segment.

Sprites and CG images were taken from the site https://itch.io/

Noraneko Games https://noranekogames.itch.io/

Backgrounds https://ayaemo.skr.jp/

Music taken from the site https://freemusicarchive.org/, under license Creative Commons Attribution 4.0:

Author:  Andy G. Cohen

song - Our Young Guts, album Prisma; 
song - Gazing, album Prisma.
Link: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Andy_G_Cohen

Author: Doctor Turtle
song - Kerchingless Wonder, album One Person Listening Now;
song - Over the Water, Humans Gather, album One Person Listening Now.
Link: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Doctor_Turtle 

Was used https://audionautix.com music under license Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 by Jason Shaw on Audionautix.com

The game is in two languages: Russian (original) and English, I also plan to translate into Japanese, but after the full release of the game.

This is my first game, so I will be glad to receive good and adequate criticism)

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/kiraru
